version_description:
-Bug Fixes where long phrase would not appear in the application
-Sharing altitude added as option

- Secure Category : Protect your private phrases with a pin under the new "Secure" category
- Share your Location through the new location button
-Fixed issue when sorting categories and phrases

-Bug Fixes where long phrase would not appear in the application
-Sharing altitude added as option

- Secure Category : Protect your private phrases with a pin under the new "Secure" category
- Share your Location through the new location button
-Fixed issue when sorting categories and phrases
-Holding down a phrase button will copy it to clipboard

- New streamlined look - Phraseboard gets a whole new look, as well as a "Dark Theme" for apps that support it such as spotlight
-iCloud Integration - Phraseboard automatically syncs your phrases to iCloud to keep all your devices phrases and categories in sync
- Enhanced phrase entry - New dedicated screen for entering phrases, now you have all the room you need to create and edit your phrases
- Location entries are now easier to read and understand
